data.text: @GiveUsAQuid Other things to worry about Sir Lefty😂. They’ll be back in time. Sadly.
@GiveUsAQuid @FlavellG They’re all switching to Geopolitical Analysis!
@FlavellG Pretty poor stuff, all things considered. Perhaps it's because it's the Hard-Right weekend? Hopefully it will pick up tomorrow ...

@GiveUsAQuid There might be an Indian Summer of covid lunacy. Though that might have passed as the attempt to make vaccination rates in the Ukraine while the tanks rolled in and the missiles dropped was, in retrospect, a failure.
@GiveUsAQuid I do believe they are running out of words. I won't say ideas because they don't have   any in their heads.
